Question: Which statements are true regarding the relationships and roles of the individuals and production company involved in the movie *Baar Baar Dekho*?
Options:
A. Katrina Kaif starred opposite Sidharth Malhotra in the film.
B. Sidharth Malhotra was the male lead in a film produced by Excel Entertainment.
C. Nitya Mehra was the director making her debut with Excel Entertainment.
D. Excel Entertainment was known for producing films with established directors only.
Answer: A) Katrina Kaif starred opposite Sidharth Malhotra in the film., B) Sidharth Malhotra was the male lead in a film produced by Excel Entertainment., C) Nitya Mehra was the director making her debut with Excel Entertainment.
